proposal: Diving into the world of Moonai, where neuroscience-based sounds offer a sanctuary from period pain and boost mental clarity, is truly innovative. Congrats on reaching 441 holders in the ETH network! Imagine integrating a DEX or a community-driven lottery, where each transaction supports the journey towards pain relief and mental wellness. Let's explore how our tools can harmonize with your vision, creating a symphony of support for your community.
